This game is completely best game in the world literally it best competitive game i recommend you to play it

This is a classic story of good vs evil. 

The evil men are trying to stop the good men from demolishing buildings that they want to remove in order to build something better and more beautiful. 

It does not always go as planned howerver and you never know what side will win or lose. 

What i can say is that it feel sad for the people that sometimes do not get a new building to enjoy.
Jogo muito bom e recomendo para todos!
